summary: The Captain Marvel Yon-Rogg Action Figure Names Him as 'Leader of the Starforce Team'
title: The Captain Marvel Yon-Rogg Action Figure Names Him as 'Leader of the Starforce Team'
body:
The #CaptainMarvel Yon-Rogg Action Figure Names Him as ‘Leader of the Starforce Team’

If you hit the toy aisle right now, you might be able to grab the Marvel Legends Captain Marvel figures, as the whole wave is showing up in stores right now. I went looking this morning and found all of them on the shelf at my local Walmart, and quickly wanted to take a look at the Yon-Rogg figure after the earlier leaks about it.

The mystery surrounding Jude Law’s character won’t be completely…

View On WordPress

summary: Letting you know what we thought of the new CM and TLoCM is important, but what did *YOU* think about them?
question: Letting you know what we thought of the new CM and TLoCM is important, but what did *YOU* think about them?
answer:
WOO. Okay. Oh boy. SPOILERS AHEAD FOR BOTH (which I will hide under a read more):

I’ll start w/ TLoCM because chronology, and all that: Short answer? I really liked it. I do think it moved a little fast, which undercut some of the emotional bits, but as a limited series tasked with streamlining/updating a complicated backstory and serving as a transitional period while the main title gears up for a relaunch? You could do a lot worse!

The longer answer is a really lengthy, ramble-y discussion on being additive to source material as opposed to deconstructing, which I feel like I can’t get into right now but BASICALLY: It was like this amazing, surgical strike that doesn’t destroy any of the crazy stuff* that happened to Carol BUT INSTEAD puts a brand new spin on it that gives Carol more agency in her own story and THAT, right there, is the way to make a character feel new and fresh and UPDATED without telling longtime fans that the stuff they’ve known for decades is all a lie and never happened.

ALSO! A COMIC PLOT LINE! ABOUT A MOTHER AND DAUGHTER! YES. GOOD. YES. I mean not great that she dies but that’s comics for ya 

As for Captain Marvel #1…what can I say. Kelly Thompson! Carmen Carnero! Tamra Bonvillain, who colors the ever-loving heck out of this thing! Jess is back! Tony and Carol bicker! And even my cold, unfeeling, no-romo heart was warmed by the Rhodey and Carol bits! An awesome first issue, it’s ABSOLUTELY going on my pull list, it’s the perfect title to have out with the movie coming out, A+++++++

*When I say ‘crazy stuff’ I am referring to her backstory, not the terrible, terrible plotline from the 80s. Obviously, Claremont had the right idea in undoing that mess.

title: Click here to support Send Girls to See Captain Marvel organized by We Have Stories
excerpt: Everyone should have an opportunity to see women in roles they can aspire to one day be, roles that show women as strong, smart and bold. From a teacher to a fighter pilot—or a superhero. This is an opportunity to continue to empower girls to be just that. Marvel Studios’ first female led film, "

summary: Captain Marvel﻿: il produttore conferma la presenza di Yon-Rogg?
title: Captain Marvel﻿: il produttore conferma la presenza di Yon-Rogg?
body:
Captain Marvel﻿: il produttore conferma la presenza di Yon-Rogg?

Il produttore Jonathan Schwartz avrebbe, a quanto pare, confermato che Yon-Rogg apparirà in Captain Marvel.

A differenza di molte origin-story del passato della Marvel, Captain Marvel inizierà con lei che ha già i suoi super poteri. Carol sarà un soldato della Starforce che inizierà a ricordare la sua vita precedente quando si schianta sulla Terra. Questa potrebbe sembrare l’origine di Carol…

View On WordPress

summary: Captain Marvel: anticipate misteriose origini per il gatto di Carol Danvers
title: Captain Marvel: anticipate misteriose origini per il gatto di Carol Danvers
body:
Captain Marvel: anticipate misteriose origini per il gatto di Carol Danvers

Si scopre che la Carol Danvers di Brie Larson non è l’unico personaggio in Captain Marvel con un passato misterioso.

Il gatto di Carol Danvers, Chewie, apparirà sul grande schermo a fianco dell’eroina della Marvel in pochi mesi, ma non sarà citato dal suo iconico appellativo. Invece, si chiamerà Goose, in rimando al personaggio di Anthony Edwards in Top Gun. Nei fumetti, Chewie è in realtà un…

summary: I keep seeing rumours that Tony Stark will be in Captain Marvel, and the only scene I will except is that one from the Brian...
body:
I keep seeing rumours that Tony Stark will be in Captain Marvel, and the only scene I will except is that one from the Brian Reed run where Tony is all:

“You’re gonna let some punkass flyboy named Cheeseburger fly my super cool stealth jet?”

And then Carol is all:

“Nah, bro, they’re letting me fly it. Peace out, Tony Stank.”*

*May not be actual dialogue

summary: Captain Marvel #1 (2019) Incentive Movie Variant Cover
title: Captain Marvel #1 (2019) Incentive Movie Variant Cover
body: #CaptainMarvel #1 (2019) Incentive Movie Variant Cover & #CarmenNunezCarnero Pencils, #KellyThompson Story, Nuclear Man Appearance As Captain Marvel, #CarolDanvers has spent months in space protecting Earth from alien threats big and small, but now it’s time for Earth’s mightiest hero to come home. New York City has never looked so good. But every re-entry comes with the unexpected, and Carol is about to hit a whole lot of unexpected. BUY NOW

summary: Here's some predictions for Captain Marvel, in Bingo form. Some of these are based on wild speculation, some on rumors, some on...
body:
Here’s some predictions for Captain Marvel, in Bingo form. Some of these are based on wild speculation, some on rumors, some on guess work, and some on general Marvel movie tropes.

More Info

  • B1: Pretty straightforward, Carol is a pilot in the Air Force, I’m guessing Stark Industries will be mentioned in that context.
  • B2: Nothing big expected here, just a small easter egg to let us know Kamala is on the way.
  • B3: As the writer that really put Carol on the map this millennium, I wouldn’t be surprised if Brian Reed is mentioned or referenced, probably as a missable background detail.
  • B4: This is mostly based on hope, but I wouldn’t be surprised if Carol is the MCU’s first openly bi character.
  • B5: Several of Stan Lee’s cameos have had him in some kind of uniform, I wouldn’t be surprised to see him as a General on the Air Force Base.
  • I1: Pretty obvious here, as long as one mid or end credits scene is in the modern time line I’ll call this a victory.
  • I2: I don’t actually expect this, but Big Grey Villains are a common trope.
  • I3: I’m betting there will be at least one scene that’s in the trailers that’s not in the actual movie.
  • I4: Some kind of sly nod to Ronan and Korath’s roles in Guardians of the Galaxy will be made.
  • I5: Roy Thomas created Captain Marvel, I’m guessing he’ll also get an Easter Egg.
  • N1: I’m betting that Jude Law is playing Yon-Rogg and all evidence to the contrary is deliberate misinformation.
  • N2: Even if Mar-Vell doesn’t actually show up in the movie, it’d be odd if none of the Vells get mentioned.
  • N3: This is a gimme, there’s going to be AT LEAST one very 90s song on the soundtrack. I’m hoping for something by Pearl Jam or Sublime.
  • N4: If Carol directly quotes any Star Wars line I get this space. Bonus points if Fury points it out.
  • N5: The danger of setting this before most of the MCU is that it is very easy to accidentally create a continuity error; I’m guessing something in this movie will directly contradict some minor fact in the canon.
  • G1: Chris Claremont wrote most of Carol’s first ongoing, I’m guessing he earns an Easter Egg.
  • G2: Coulson is going to say or do something extremely dorky.
  • G3: Another MCU trope, the final fight of the movie will have Carol facing off against someone with her same powers.
  • G4: This is more a hope than prediction, but Jessica Drew showing up in the end credits scene would be nice.
  • G5: Another gimme, everyone is predicting that we’ll see Fury lose his eye, so I’ll jump on that bandwagon.
  • O1: It’s not enough for Carol to go super sayin, it actually has to be reffered to as going Binary to get this point.
  • O2: I’m guessing the Skrulls aren’t going to be as blatantly evil as the Kree propaganda that Carol spouts in the trailer claims they are.
  • O3: We know Maria Rambeau is showing up, Monica appearing as a baby or toddler will earn this point.
  • O4: KSD gave Carol the promotion to Captain, we’ve heard rumors already that she has a cameo, so I think this is one of my more probable guesses.
  • O5: This might be one of my less likely guesses, but the giant tentacled head of the Supreme Intelligence will show up, even if only for a moment.
